links.title: Demand An Investigation Into Georgie's Injuries
links.description:
Georgie was adopted from Ardmore Animal Shelter. Two weeks later, he was found wandering the streets of Ardmore with second-degree burns on his head, neck, legs, and paw pads, which are believed to be intentionally inflicted. @ntxaussie took him in and gave him a second chance at life. However, his adopted owner, Isaiah Nugent, has refused to answer questions from Ardmore Animal Shelter and has not been investigated.

Thank you, @ntxaussie, for giving Georgie a fighting chance.
And thank you, @therealpaulmueller for bringing this to our attention.

links.title: Demand Animal Welfare Laws in Vietnam
links.description: There are currently no comprehensive animal welfare laws in Vietnam. Any protections animals have are flimsy at best and nestled into other legislation, leaving plenty of wiggle room for loopholes to be exploited. Due to these exploits, dogs and cats are stolen from the streets to be slaughtered in deplorable conditions with no legal consequences. A ban on dog meat has been in effect in Hanoi since 2021, but there is no national ban yet, despite 64% of Vietnamese people supporting one.

links.title: Stop Ugandan Rescue Scams
links.description:
Name of this scam account: @kaweesi6110

Report them.

These dogs show clear, fearful body language. The screams you can hear in the background are screams of pain. Ugandan scam rescues abuse, deliberately injure, and disable dogs in order to gain donations.

If you're suspicious of a rescue account, please send the account to me or @wewontbescammed and ask.

DO NOT GIVE THEM YOUR MONEY.

links.title: Stop Black Market Monkey Torture
links.description:
Instagram is once again hosting animal torture rings, this time, targeting monkeys.
These accounts are openly advertising, torturing, and killing primates for profit and selling the footage on encrypted platforms like Telegram and WhatsApp.

@sami91777: Sells on WhatsApp [+9620788141285] (Jordan)
@dememonkey: Sells on Telegram [Tgmonkey1] (China)
@dont_hurt_the_monkeys: Sells on Telegram [st_monkeys] (Iran)
@damnmonkey5: Sells on Telegram [Tgmonkey1] (China)
@bad_guydead: Sells on Telegram [Tgmonkey2] (China)
@monkeybad_guy: Sells on Telegram [Tgmonkey2] (China)

Report these accounts under ‚Äúanimal abuse‚Äù.
Tag @instagram, @meta, and @interpol_hq in their comments demanding intervention.

Each of these Instagram accounts were active at the time of posting. I can not confirm the status of the Telegram accounts.

Instagram‚Äôs continued inaction is complicity.
We are calling for immediate suspension of these accounts, cross-platform investigations, and criminal referrals to Jordanian, Iranian, and Chinese cybercrime units.

links.title: Stop Bronx Cat Killer
links.description: Potential location: 244 E 198th St, Apt 6E, Bronx NY 10458, and sometimes at Williamsbridge Oval Skate Park. A 'man' known only as ‚ÄúDavid‚Äù, who tortured and killed a cat, then posted it to Instagram for entertainment. His page @churchofububal has since been deleted, but the YouTube channel under the same name remains active. He has now threatened to kill another animal on October 31. He is believed to be around 27, with a left-side neck tattoo, a Spider-Man tattoo on his right rib, and another on his right hand. This is mental illness.

links.title: Dog Run Over & Killed In Dallas, TX
links.description:
Appeal for information.
On October 9, 2025, on the 11200 block of Balch Springs Road at roughly 7:30 A.M. A red Dodge pickup ran over a dog in the street, reversed, and ran the dog over again, painting a clear image of intent.

"Cruelty is whenever you turn the wheel intentionally, and you hit the dog for a second time,"

Balch Springs police and animal services have located the red Dodge truck, but they still need tips that can lead them to the driver.

The dog, unfortunately, did not make it üíî

phones.who: Balch Springs Animal Services Supervisor Chelsie Way

links.title: Justice For Aria
links.description: Aria was a 12-year-old Maltese-Shih Tzu. On August 29 2025, while her family was on vacation, she died under the care of Rover sitter Barbara Paz in Miami. She said she ‚Äúpassed peacefully in her sleep.‚Äù Aria‚Äôs eye was protruding from the socket, and her scalp separated from her skull,and she was cremated without consent to destroy the evidence.
